casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jerome C. McCOY. No. 463A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2005. Matthew Wunsche, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Jerome C. McCoy. R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st day of August 2005 by Attorney General to Dismiss Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of October 2005."
